talk: just continue talking, no special function should be called
note_to_freq: get frequency of a given note, e.g. C4 -> 261.63 Hz
freq_to_note: get note of a frequency, e.g. 261.63 Hz -> C4
bpm_to_spb: get second per beat of a give bpm, e.g. 60 -> 1.0
spb_to_bpm: get bpm of a given second per beat, e.g. 1.0 -> 60
